title: marakata simhAsana
sahitya:
marakata simhAsana narasimhA durita citta gaja simhA pAhi


anupallavi

  muraLInAda sudhA svAda varadA yAdagiri nAtha
			(ciTTasvara)
, P P P S* s* s* p p R* r* p G* g* R*R* n S* S* d N n
, m n g m P r g m p D g m p D g m p d N m p d N m p d


caraNam    AhlAdamu nI vIkSaNamu prahlAduniki rakSaNamu
AnandAtmaka abhayAkSatalE akSayamai dorikEni kSaNamu
